trans-unit.source: Describes the location and color of a transition point in a gradient.
trans-unit.target: 描述渐变中转换点的位置和颜色。

trans-unit.source: Use this class to describe the colors in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此类来描述中的颜色<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>。

trans-unit.source: Note that this class does not provide an opacity property; to make a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop> semi-transparent, set its <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Color%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property with a transparent <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此类不提供的不透明度属性;若要使<xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop>半透明，将其<xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Color%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>具有透明属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>。

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features
trans-unit.target: Freezable 功能

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop> is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop>是一种<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，因此可以冻结以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 璝惠<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，如冻结和克隆，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The color value of the gradient stop.
trans-unit.target: 梯度停止点的颜色值。

trans-unit.source: The location in the gradient where the gradient stop is placed.
trans-unit.target: 梯度停止点在梯度中放置的位置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> class with the specified color and offset.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的颜色和偏移量初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the gradient stop.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置渐变停止点的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The color of the gradient stop.
trans-unit.target: 渐变停止点的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Colors.Transparent" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Colors.Transparent" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Color" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Color" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of the gradient stop within the gradient vector.
trans-unit.target: 获取渐变向量中渐变停止点的位置。

trans-unit.source: The relative location of this gradient stop along the gradient vector.
trans-unit.target: 沿渐变向量的该渐变停止点的相对位置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0.0。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.0 specifies that the stop is positioned at the beginning of the gradient vector, while a value of 1.0 specifies that the stop is positioned at the end of the gradient vector.
trans-unit.target: 值 0.0 指定停止点位于开头的渐变向量中，而值为 1.0 指定停止点位于渐变向量末尾处。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Offset" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Offset" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The format to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: null 引用（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）将使用为 <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> 实现的类型所定义的默认格式。

trans-unit.source: The provider to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: 要用于对值设置格式的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: null 引用（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）将从操作系统的当前区域设置中获取数字格式信息。

trans-unit.source: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定格式对当前实例的值设置格式。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 采用指定格式的当前实例的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this object based on the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 基于当前区域性创建此对象的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this object based on the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 基于当前区域性创建此对象的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this object that contains its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Color" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Offset" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 此对象的字符串表示形式，包含该对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Color" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Offset" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Culture specific formatting information, or <see langword="null" /> to use the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 区域性特定的格式设置信息；如果使用当前区域性，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this object based on the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 基于指定的区域性特定格式设置信息创建此对象的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this object that contains its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Color" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Offset" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 此对象的字符串表示形式，包含该对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Color" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientStop.Offset" /> 值。
